title: Stephen Merchant's 6ft 7in frame towers over his 5ft 6in girlfriend Mircea Monroe
text:
Stephen Merchant and his girlfriend Mircea Monroe looked very loved-up as they attended the JoJo Rabbit premiere in LA on Tuesday night.

The funnyman, 44, towered over his actress love, 37, with his 6ft 7in frame, standing tall against her 5ft 6in stature.

They gazed into one another's eyes as they walked the red carpet at the Hollywood American Legion Post 43 venue.

Making an appearance: Stephen Merchant's 6ft 7in frame towered over his 5ft 6in girlfriend Mircea Monroe at the JoJo Rabbit premiere in LA on Tuesday night

Jojo Rabbit is a 2019 satirical black comedy movie and Extras star Stephen stars as Captain Deertz, in JoJo Rabbit, a Gestapo agent.

Scarlett Johansson and Sam Rockwell also star in the movie, which is slated for release in October 18 in the United States.

Stephen was dressed smartly to promote the film, in a blue suit which he wore over a patterned shirt.

Mircea wore a pink mini dress with oversized sleeves and chunky flat boots.

Having a moment: They gazed into one another's eyes as they walked the red carpet at the Hollywood American Legion Post 43 venue

Love: The couple have been dating for around a year and a half - and Mircea is best known for starring in Episodes and is a former Maxim cover star who studied at the Virginia Commonwealth University.

Speaking to the i, Stephen previously detailed how he struggled to find love during his time in Hollywood and spoke through the strife of dating in his late thirties.

He said: 'Aside from the fact that she’s great, hitting the age of 40, there’s something very pleasing about not having the endless concern about filling that part of your life. That’s a very lonely life, the life of a single person...

'There’s a lot of nights where you’re watching those DVDs on your own. [When I was single] I was spending a fortune.

'You’re going out, you’re eating three-course meals. It’s expensive, you’re overweight, you’re drinking a lot'.

He also poked fun at how his height can impact his prowess in the bedroom as he said: 'If they’re down there and I’m up here, it’s a bit tricky.'
